item.title: How to Contribute to AORTA
item.description: How do I contribute to AORTA? You can contribute in two ways to AORTA: By managing and writing notes for a medical learning objective. By adding extended-matching questions (EMQs) under a learning objective. Both ways of contributing require you to register an account on AORTA. Registration is free and doesn't require any information from you except a username you choose and an optional email. Below are instructions for:
